data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ito, Tomiko, Shimura, Noriyoshi (2019): Notes on six microcaddisfly species (Trichoptera: Hydroptilidae) recorded for Japan, one a newly described species. Zootaxa 4629 (1): 26-38, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4629.1.2|20 occurrences
